content.question: A <math alttext="10" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> percent increase in the price of a good results in a <math alttext="4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> percent increase in total revenue. From this information, it can be concluded that the demand over this range of prices

choices.label: has a price elasticity of demand equal to <math alttext="2.5" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2.5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
